animeTitle: Issho ni Training Ofuro: Bathtime with Hinako & Hiyoko
animeDescription: Viewers take an exercise in the bathtub and an after-bath stretch with Hinako and the new character Hiyoko. A microSD card containing the OVA data will be bundled with the DVD so that users can watch the anime on their cell phones.  Stretch Time segment included.
animeRelated: ['Issho ni Training: Training with Hinako', 'Issho ni Sleeping: Sleeping with Hinako']
animeStaff: [['Nakagawa Muneshige', ['Producer', 'Script', 'Planning']], ['Kimura Shinichiro', ['Director']], ['Hashi Katsuhiro', ['Art Director']], ['Sugimoto Isao', ['Animation Director']]]
